sn51.10:3.1: bahuputtaṁ cetiyaṁ → bahuputtakacetiyaṁ (sya-all, km, pts1ed, mr) | sārandadaṁ cetiyaṁ → sārandadacetiyaṁ (sya-all); ānandacetiyaṁ (mr); sānandaraṁ (katthaci)
sn51.10:9.1: parinibbātu dāni sugato → parinibbātu sugato (bj, sya-all, km)
sn51.10:17.2: Ossaṭṭhe ca → ossaṭṭhe pana (pts1ed); osajje pana (mr) | devadundubhiyo → devadudrabhiyo (mr)
